tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE traffic_violations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    violation_type VARCHAR(50),
    violation_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    fine_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE parking_violations (
  violation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_plate_number VARCHAR(20),
  violation_type VARCHAR(50),
  violation_date DATE,
  fine_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
CREATE TABLE speeding_tickets (id INT, vehicle_number VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(255), speed INT, fine_amount DECIMAL(10,2));
CREATE TABLE parking_violations (id INT, vehicle_number VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(255), violation_type VARCHAR(255), fine_amount DECIMAL(10,2));
CREATE TABLE traffic_cameras (id INT, location VARCHAR(255), camera_type VARCHAR(255), status VARCHAR(255));

CREATE TABLE speeding_tickets (
  ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT,
  violation_date DATE,
  violation_location VARCHAR,
  fine_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE parking_tickets (
  ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT,
  violation_date DATE,
  violation_location VARCHAR,
  fine_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE SpeedingTickets (
    ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    driver_name VARCHAR(255),
    vehicle_plate VARCHAR(10),
    violation_date DATE,
    fine_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
